2 REM **** ASK FOR STARTING POINTS *****
5 HOME
7 HCOLOR = 3
10 PRINT CHR$(255) " TRANSLATE TO"
20 PRINT "  INPUT X, Y, Z"
25 FO = 30000
27 PRINT CHR$(4);"BLOAD ]SMALL STANDARD,A";FO
30 INPUT "  ";X
33 INPUT "  ";Y
35 INPUT "  ";Z
36 ZZ = 1

38 REM **** BUILD ROOM ********
40 HGR : POKE - 16302,0
50 FOR I = 1 TO (1088/4)
60 READ X1: READ Y1
70 READ X2: READ Y2
80 HPLOT X1,Y1 TO X2,Y2
90 NEXT I

95 REM ***** SETUP SPHERE SHAPE *****
100 ROT = 0: SCALE = ZZ: HCOLOR=2
110 SH=25000:D$ = CHR$(4)
120 PRINT D$;"BLOAD SPHERES,A";SH
125 PX = X: PY = Y: PZ = Z
130 GOSUB 600
140 GOSUB 800
200 XDRAW Z AT X,Y

250 REM **** KEYBOARD CONTROL  ****
255 GET A$
260 IF A$ =  CHR$ (8) AND X > 1 THEN X = X-1 : GOTO 400 : REM LEFT
270 IF A$ =  CHR$ (11) AND Y > 1 THEN Y = Y-1 : GOTO 400 : REM UP
280 IF A$ =  CHR$ (10) AND Y < 191 THEN Y = Y+1 : GOTO 400 : REM DOWN
290 IF A$ =  CHR$ (21) AND X < 279 THEN X = X+1 : GOTO 400 : REM RIGHT
300 IF A$ =  CHR$ (27) THEN  GOTO 900 : REM ESCAPE
310 IF A$ =  CHR$ (65) AND Z > 1 THEN Z = Z-1 : GOTO 500 : REM AWAY
320 IF A$ =  CHR$ (90) AND Z < 6 THEN Z = Z+1 : GOTO 500 : REM TOWARD

390 REM ***** MOVING SPHERE *****
400 GOSUB 800
401 XDRAW Z AT PX,PY
410 PX = X: PY = Y
420 XDRAW Z AT X,Y
430 GOTO 255

490 REM ***** SCALING SPHERE *****
500 GOSUB 800
501 XDRAW PZ AT X,Y
505 PZ = Z
510 SCALE = ZZ
520 XDRAW Z AT X,Y
530 GOTO 255


600 REM ******* PRINT DATA *********
602 POKE 232,FO - INT (FO / 256) * 256 
603 POKE 233, INT (FO / 256)
604 SCALE = 1: ROT = 0: HCOLOR=3
640 XF = 150 : XY = 150
642 DIM U$(2)
643 U$(1) = "X Y Z X Y Z X Y Z"
644 U$(2) = "POS  " + STR$(X)+"  "+STR$(Y)+"  "+STR$(Z)
646 FOR D = 1 TO 2
648 XY = XY + 10
650 FOR L = 1 TO LEN(U$(D)) 
660 XB$ = MID$(U$(D),L)     
670 C = (ASC(XB$) - 31) 
680 DRAW C AT XF,XY
690 XF = XF + 6
700 NEXT L
702 XF = 150
704 NEXT D
744 RETURN

800 REM ******** POINT TO SPHERES*******
810 POKE 232,SH - INT (SH/256)*256
820 POKE 233,INT(SH/256)
830 RETURN

900 END
980 REM ********* DATA ********************
990 REM **** BACK WALL AND RIGHT WALL  ****
1000 DATA 1,5,32,8,32,8,66,2,66,2,168,10,168,10,172,8,172,8,221,12,221,12,211
1010 DATA 22,211,22,278,27,278,27,278,75,1,77,42,81,42,81,72,67,72,67,166,77
1020 DATA 166,77,170,74,170,74,215,78,215,78,203,100,203,100,263,106,263,106
1030 DATA 257,191,42,81,32,8,72,67,66,2,166,77,168,10,170,73,172,8,215,78,221
1040 DATA 12,203,100,211,22,263,106,278,27,209,100,215,38,215,38,236,39,236,39
1050 DATA 229,102,142,74,143,21,143,21,161,22,161,22,159,76,181,42,181,22,181
1060 DATA 22,200,24,200,24,198,43,198,43,181,42,82,17,83,35,83,35,100,37,100
1070 DATA 37,99,18,99,18,82,17,118,39,119,20,119,20,103,18,103,18,102,37,102
1080 DATA 37,118,39,269,88,275,63,275,63,274,55,274,55,269,81,269,81,269,88
1090 DATA 267,129,276,97,276,97,275,84,275,84,267,116,267,116,267,129,264,190
1100 DATA 264,182,264,182,277,132
1110 REM **** BOOKSHELF? *****
1120 DATA 91,99,108,101,108,101,123,88,123,88,109,87,109,87,91,99,91,99,86,19
1130 DATA 86,19,105,13,105,13,122,14,122,14,105,20,105,20,86,19,105,13,109,87
1140 DATA 105,20,108,101,122,14,123,88
1150 REM **** DESK AND CHAIR *****
1160 DATA 176,131,181,133,181,133,185,127,185,127,180,125,180,125,176,131,176
1170 DATA 131,178,107,178,107,144,104,144,104,148,98,148,98,128,96,128,96,130
1180 DATA 91,130,91,154,93,154,93,156,87,156,87,165,88,165,88,167,85,167,85
1190 DATA 157,84,157,84,155,87,148,98,151,99,151,99,165,101,165,101,166,97,166
1200 DATA 97,153,95,153,95,151,99,153,95,154,93,166,97,165,88,165,101,168,96
1210 DATA 168,96,167,85,154,94,165,95,154,97,163,98,165,101,182,102,168,94,186
1220 DATA 97,186,97,182,102,182,102,178,107,165,100,182,102,181,102,181,133
1230 DATA 186,97,185,127,180,125,181,103,143,120,148,117,148,117,147,98,143
1240 DATA 120,144,104,131,96,131,114,131,114,133,119,133,119,128,125,128,125
1250 DATA 126,119,126,119,131,114,126,119,125,98,125,98,128,96,128,125,137,127
1260 DATA 137,127,137,105,137,105,139,102,139,102,141,103,141,103,141,120,141
1270 DATA 120,137,126,138,102,139,126,139,144,139,126,139,144,141,144,141,144
1280 DATA 142,120,141,130,151,129,141,125,151,125,144,122,151,125,146,119,153
1290 DATA 121,153,121,151,125,151,125,151,129,151,129,151,144,151,144,152,143
1300 DATA 152,143,152,128,152,128,153,121
1310 REM ***** WATER HEATER ******
1320 DATA 113,54,115,53,115,53,117,52,117,52,119,52,119,52,121,52,121,52,123
1330 DATA 53,123,53,125,54,125,54,127,97,127,97,125,99,125,99,122,53,121,52
1340 DATA 122,101,122,101,124,99,118,52,119,100,119,100,121,101,115,53,116
1350 DATA 100,116,100,118,100,112,54,114,96,114,96,116,97,116,97,116,100,111
1360 DATA 75,118,71,118,71,119,80,119,80,112,85,112,85,111,75
1370 REM ***** FURNACE ******
1380 DATA 84,145,89,147,89,147,96,148,96,148,104,148,104,148,113,147,113,147
1390 DATA 119,144,119,144,122,140,122,140,122,137,122,137,117,134,117,134,112
1400 DATA 133,112,133,104,132,104,132,96,133,96,133,89,136,89,136,85,138,85
1410 DATA 138,84,145,85,138,89,115,89,115,91,113,91,113,96,110,96,110,103,109
1420 DATA 103,109,108,109,108,109,113,111,113,111,116,112,116,112,116,114,116
1430 DATA 114,113,116,113,116,110,118,110,118,103,118,103,118,97,119,97,119,92
1440 DATA 118,92,118,89,115,89,147,92,118,96,148,97,119,104,148,103,118,113
1450 DATA 147,109,119,119,144,113,117,122,138,115,114,92,118,92,112,97,119,96
1460 DATA 110,103,119,103,109,110,118,108,109,114,116,113,111,88,191,91,187,91
1470 DATA 187,98,185,98,185,106,182,106,182,114,183,114,183,120,185,120,185
1480 DATA 123,188,123,188,123,191,119,191,118,144,114,191,112,147,106,190
1490 DATA 104,148,98,190,96,148,88,190,84,144,123,188,122,140
1500 REM ***** CUBE *****
1510 DATA 14,190,98,122,98,122,1,109,88,190,101,175,101,175,98,122,101,175,2,158
1520 REM ***** LIGHT ******
1530 DATA 57,121,66,122,66,122,72,118,72,118,72,115,72,115,66,117,66,117,57
1540 DATA 117,57,117,63,113,63,113,71,115,57,121,57,117,66,122,66,117,59,115
1550 DATA 53,60,53,60,56,59,56,59,63,60,63,60,57,62,57,62,53,60,56,59,63,113
1560 DATA 65,113,59,59,63,60,69,113
1570 REM **** CIELING AND STAIRS *****
1580 DATA 1,21,95,31,95,31,90,36,90,36,37,77,37,77,1,100,1,30,77,37,77,37,1
1590 DATA 100,77,37,94,31,43,116,13,91,2,123,40,101,40,101,36,70,36,70,4,66,4
1600 DATA 66,9,97,9,97,16,99,35,70,1,83,36,71,1,85,27,129,1,102,27,129,37,129
1610 DATA 37,129,54,117,54,117,54,113,54,113,36,123,36,123,36,129,27,128,46
1620 DATA 116,36,123,29,121,29,121,46,111,46,111,54,112,28,121,28,116,28,116
1630 DATA 45,106,45,106,46,111,28,116,19,113,19,113,38,102,38,102,45,105,19
1640 DATA 113,19,109,19,109,36,98,36,98,37,102,19,109,12,108,12,108,30,97,30
1650 DATA 97,36,98,11,107,11,102,11,102,30,93,30,93,30,97,10,102,4,99,4,99,23
1660 DATA 90,23,90,30,93,4,99,3,95,3,95,22,86,21,86,23,90,2,95,2,90,2,90,15,84
1670 DATA 15,84,21,86
